sense.def:
Predmet, ki je
sharp
, ima zelo ozek rob ali ostro konico, zato zlahka prereže ali preluknja stvari.

seg.quote: Cut it away with a sharp knife.

sense.def:
Slika, obris ali razlika je
sharp
, kadar je jasna in dobro vidna ali prepoznavna.

seg.quote: We try to draw a sharp dividing line between Civil Service and Government.
His clothes contrast sharply with Gaspar's.

sense.def:
Kdor je
sharp
, hitro opazi, sliši ali razume stvari.

seg.quote: You've got to be sharp to get ahead.
His sharp eyes would never miss it.

sense.def:
Sprememba, ki je
sharp
, je nenadna in zelo velika.

seg.quote: Sales of the car have risen sharply in recent weeks.

sense.def:
Dejanje ali premik, ki je
sharp
, je hiter in odločen.

seg.quote: She received a sharp clout on the head.
With his finger and thumb he gave it a sharp turn.
Both birds turned their heads sharply at the sound.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj rečemo
in a sharp way
, rečemo nenadoma in precej odločno ali jezno.

seg.quote: A sharp order came through his headphones.

sense.def:
Zvok, ki je
sharp
, je zelo kratek, nenaden in precej glasen.

Bolečina ali mraz, ki je
sharp
, je zelo močan.

seg.quote: His blistered foot at that moment caused him a sharp pang.

sense.def:
Kadar ima hrana okus, ki je
sharp
, je nekoliko kisla in osvežujoča.

Kadar se nekaj zgodi
at a certain time sharp
, se zgodi natančno ob navedenem času.

seg.quote: His train came in at eight sharp.

gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
ADJ
after
N

sense.def:
V glasbi je
a sharp
nota, ki je za pol tona višja od note, opisane z isto črko. Navadno jo označimo s simbolom (*5X113) za črko.

Kadar noto zaigramo ali zapojemo
sharp
, je nekoliko višja, kot naj bi bila.
